column1: Kata Robata////Considering the number of very good sushi restaurants in Houston and in the same neighborhood
column2: I found Kata to be a big disappointment. It is overpriced for
column4: very average food. Service was uneven: the dishes we ordered first came out after the dishes we ordered later; we couldn't get our waiter to come by for the longest stretches of time; but as soon as they figured out we were not ordering any more
column5: they were very eager to get us to pay so they could flip the table. All in all
column6: not a very pleasant dining experience.
